name: Dog Home Alone
description:
This is my entry for GMTK Game Jam 2020.

My dog died during the jam. I decided to make this game in memory of him. 
If the game is lagging when playing in the browser please try to download it.

Description
You play as a dog that is out of control when left alone at home. You have a list of tasks you need to complete before your human comes home. Get ready to eat all the chicken, flush the tv-remote, and more!

Controls
Move: WASD
Jump: Space
Toggle music: M
Toggle sound: N
Back to menu: Escape

Team
I did this Game Jam alone. You can find me on Twitter @LeviMooreDev

Animations: https://www.mixamo.com/
Door sound effects: https://www.gamedevmarket.net/asset/home-and-office-sfx-pack-lite-619/
